list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an activity involving physical exertion and skill in which an individual or team competes against another or others for entertainment.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: team sports such as baseball and soccer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đội thể thao như bóng chày và bóng đá

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who behaves in a good or specified way in response to teasing, defeat, or a similarly trying situation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tiếp tục, hãy là một môn thể thao!

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an animal or plant showing abnormal or striking variation from the parent type, especially in form or color, as a result of spontaneous mutation.
wear or display (a distinctive or noticeable item).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was sporting a huge handlebar mustache
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã thể thao một bộ ria mép tay cầm khổng lồ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: amuse oneself or play in a lively, energetic way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the children sported in the water
